translations: n.商人，（尤指外贸）批发商；<美>商店老板；<英，非正式>对（令人讨厌之事）入迷的人
adj.海上货运的；商业的，商人的

sentences.sentence: Any knowledgeable wine merchant would be able to advise you.
sentences.translation: 任何一位内行的葡萄酒商人都能为你提出建议。

sentences.sentence: There's been a big reduction in the size of the merchant fleet in recent years.
sentences.translation: 近年来商船队的数量大为缩减。

sentences.sentence: We sell it to the cotton merchant.
sentences.translation: 我们把它卖给棉花商人。
